'''''Proof by Exhaustion''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VII]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat [[Iniquitous Baptist]]s of all possible elemental combinations.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
*The achievement's name refers to a mathematical method to prove a statement with a finite number of cases is true by showing that it holds up for each case.
